text: The Democratic Front for the Liberation of Palestine (DFLP) is a Palestinian organization. It follows a political ideology of Marxist–Leninism and Maoism. It it also sometimes reffered as the Democratic Front or al-Jabha al- Dīmūqrāṭiyya in the Arabic language (). It is part of the Palestine Liberation Organization, the Alliance of Palestinian Forces, and the Democratic Alliance List. The group was formed in 1969 by breaking away from the Popular Front for the Liberation of Palestine and was formed by Nayef Hawatmeh. ==References== Category:Palestinian nationalism Category:Nationalist terrorism Category:Gaza–Israel conflict Category:National liberation movements Category:Palestine Liberation Organization Category:Secularism in Palestine Category:Popular Front for the Liberation of Palestine Category:Marxism
title: Democratic Front for the Liberation of Palestine
